name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PageTalk - Leave Comments on Any Site

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to comment and interact on any website page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PageTalk is a browser extension that enables you to comment and interact on any webpage. Seamlessly add comments, share your thoughts, and engage in discussions directly on the pages you visit. Perfect for collaborative work, social interactions, and providing feedback.
